subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Daryle Ward hit a two-run double in the eighth inning, and the host Chicago Cubs rallied to defeat the Arizona Diamondbacks, 6-4, on Sunday.
snippet: Pinch-hitter Daryle Ward hit a two-run double in the eighth inning, and the host Chicago Cubs rallied to defeat the Arizona Diamondbacks, 6-4, on Sunday.
